TopicTitle: Preview thumbnails in VAB are not shown

Articles.Content:
This happens in Version 1.0.2 (and also did in 1.0.x before):

If your game name contains some umlaut characters (e.g. "ÃƒÂ¶" or "ÃƒÂ¤"), the load dialog in the VAB does not show any thumnails of your own ships (those that are stored at "saves\[gamename]\ships\vab"). The default ships are shown with thumbnails correctly.

Renaming your game (i.e. the folder under "saves") will fix this issue.

Looks as if there is some kind of encoding issue here.
